NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Company Culture or Work-Life Balance?
NC.A: {Work-Life Balance} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Job Security or Remote Work Options?
NC.A: {Remote Work Options} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.
